name: node-express-babel-boilerplate
description: Boilerplate of node.js express app with babel and es6 source code.

scripts.serve: npm run build && npm run copy && nodemon --watch dist
scripts.serve_debug: babel server/ -d dist/ | webpack --devtool source-map && npm run copy && nodemon --watch dist

author: Maciej Sikora hello@maciejsikora.com
